DOC.brief_summary: A recent prospective nonrandomized placebo-controlled double-blind clinical study demonstrate metformin exerts slight significant deleterious effect serum homocysteine ( Hcy ) level patient PCOS , supplementation folate useful increase beneficial effect metformin vascular endothelium .
DOC.brief_title: Metformin Folate Pregnant Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) Women
DOC.detailed_description: PCOS ( case ) non-PCOS ( control ) pregnant woman enrol . Cases randomize four treatment group : metformin plus placebo ( group A1 ) , metformin plus folic acid ( group A2 ) , placebo plus folic acid ( group A3 ) , placebo alone ( group A4 ) . Controls receive treatment ( group B ) . Clinical biochemical assessment ( include serum marker implantation ) , Doppler velocimetry uterine artery , trophoblastic invasion histological immunohistochemical evaluation . Changes clinical biochemical data treatment , pattern Doppler velocimetry uterine artery , trophoblastic invasion evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy PCOS Risk factor pregnancy complication Severe obesity
